document.full_text: jpmorgan chase & co  will return more than $800 million of cash and securities to resolve claims by the trustee for lehman brothers holdings inc's  brokerage after the sides agreed how best the assets should be distributed to customers.
document.title: jpmorgan to return $861 million to lehman brokerage
lines_and_colors: jpmorgan chase & co  will return more than $800 million of cash and securities to resolve claims by the trustee for lehman brothers holdings inc's  brokerage after the sides agreed how best the assets should be distributed to customers.
